europeana:record.dc:title: A new species of Phenacephorus from Kalimantan (Insecta: Phasmida: Heteronemiidae: Lonchodinae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Bragg P.E.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Phasmida; Lonchodinae; Phenacephorus parahaematomus; P. auriculatus; Borneo; Brunei; Sabah; Kalimantan
europeana:record.dc:description: Phenacephorus parahaematomus spec. nov. is described and illustrated. The species is based on two male specimens which were collected in Borneo in 1925. The stout spines on the metanotum and general form closely resembles Lonchodes haematomus Westwood but P. parahaematomus has a spinose mound on the back of the head and spines on the pronotum and abdominal segments. Some new distribution data is given for Phenacephorus auriculatus (Brunner), and the egg is described and illustrated.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: A new species of Phenacephorus from Kalimantan (Insecta: Phasmida: Heteronemiidae: Lonchodinae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 69) (Issue 16)
